item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Doris Lessing
item.description: "You should write, first of all, to please yourself. You shouldn't care a damn about anybody else at all. But writing can't be a way of life - the important part of writing is living. You have to live in such a way that your writing emerges from it." -- Doris Lessing

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "It's such a shame to waste time. We always think we have so much of it." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Jason Myers
item.description: "Sometimes life is a constant battle against the nostalgia of a time that can never be real again." -- Jason Myers

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Warren Zevon
item.description:
"We buy books because we believe we're buying the time to read them.
[<i>Inside Out</i> (VH1)]" -- Warren Zevon

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "Entahlah, mungkin semacam keajaiban bahwa seringkali ketulusan yang ada dalam batin seseorang menjelma sinar yang tak pernah pudar di wajah. Padahal mungkin rupa dan penampilanmu biasa saja. Tapi kau indah. Cerlang. Itulah mengapa pada pertemuan pertama kita aku langsung menganggapmu sebagai seseorang yang akan kuabadikan selamanya dalam rinduku." -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Icha_nisa add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Nobody likes being alone that much. I don't go out of my way to make friends, that's all. It just leads to disappointment. " -- Haruki Murakami
